      • getFichier

        public Fichier getFichier(int id)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all files in databases
        Parameters:
        id - The identifying number of the file to retrieve from the database
        Returns:
        A File object with all their attributes from the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception in case it didn't work properly

      • getFichierAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Fichier> getFichierAll()
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all Files from the database and then puts them all in a list
        Returns:
        A list of Fichier objects with all their attributes from the database
        Throws:

      • insertFichier

        public void insertFichier(java.lang.String nom_fichier,
                 java.lang.String commentaire,
                 int id_matiere,
                 byte[] fichier)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts a new File into the database
        Parameters:
        nom_fichier - The name of the file
        date_fichier - The date of the file
        commentaire - The comment of the file
        id_matiere - The comment of the file
        fichier - The file
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception in case it didn't work properly
